languages.text: {n}Кибелла улыбается вам, с ресниц капают слезы.{/n} "Я... знала, что таким будет ответ. Лабиринт не таит разгадку всех тайн — некоторые надо искать в других. В тебе. Ты — мой ответ и благословение... Быть собой".
languages.translation_comment:
Если на каунтере Synchronicity три очка.
Запускаем этюд Synchronicity, каунтер KibellahTaint обнуляем

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла приникает к вам с мучительным вздохом.{/n} "Благодарю тебя. Я обещаю... я найду ответ. И мы будем вместе... чего бы это не стоило".

languages.translation_comment:
Если на каунтере Synchronicity три очка.
Запускаем этюд Synchronicity, каунтер KibellahTaint обнуляем

languages.text: {n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to drip from her lashes.{/n} "And there's the answer... as I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in other people. In you. You are my answer and my blessing... The blessing to be myself."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла улыбается вам, с ресниц капают слезы.{/n} "Я... знала, что таким будет ответ. Лабиринт не таит разгадку всех тайн — некоторые надо искать в других. В тебе. Ты — мой ответ и благословение... Быть собой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to fall from her eyelashes.{/n} "And that's the answer... I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in others. In you. You are my answer and blessing... The blessing to be myself."

{n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to drip from her lashes.{/n} "And there's the answer... as I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in other people. In you. You are my answer and my blessing... The blessing to be myself."

{n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to drip from her lashes.{/n} "And there's the answer... as I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in other people. In you. You are my answer and my blessing... The blessing to be myself."

{n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to drip from her lashes.{/n} "And there's the answer... as I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in other people. In you. You are my answer and my blessing... The blessing to be myself."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah lächelt, und Tränen beginnen, von ihren Wimpern zu tropfen.{/n} "Und da ist die Antwort ... ich wusste es. Das Labyrinth enthält nicht die Schlüssel zu allen Mysterien. Einige muss man in anderen Leuten finden. In Euch. Ihr seid meine Antwort und mein Segen ... Der Segen, ich selbst zu sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to drip from her lashes.{/n} "And there's the answer... as I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in other people. In you. You are my answer and my blessing... The blessing to be myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah lächelt, und Tränen beginnen, von ihren Wimpern zu tropfen.{/n} "Und da ist die Antwort ... ich wusste es. Das Labyrinth enthält nicht die Schlüssel zu allen Mysterien. Einige muss man in anderen Leuten finden. In Euch. Ihr seid meine Antwort und mein Segen ... Der Segen, ich selbst zu sein."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah sonríe mientras las lágrimas empiezan a caer entre sus pestañas.{/n} «Y ahí está la respuesta... como sabía que estaría. El laberinto no contiene la solución a todos los misterios: algunos deben resolverse a través de otras personas. A través de ti. Eres mi respuesta y mi bendición... La bendición de ser yo misma».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to drip from her lashes.{/n} "And there's the answer... as I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in other people. In you. You are my answer and my blessing... The blessing to be myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah sonríe mientras las lágrimas empiezan a caer entre sus pestañas.{/n} «Y ahí está la respuesta... como sabía que estaría. El laberinto no contiene la solución a todos los misterios: algunos deben resolverse a través de otras personas. A través de ti. Eres mi respuesta y mi bendición... La bendición de ser yo misma».

languages.text: {n}まつ毛から涙が零れ落ちる中、キベラがほほ笑む。{/n}「答えはそこにある…予想していたとおりに。迷宮がすべての謎の鍵を握っているわけではない。一部は他の人の中に見つけるべきものなの。あなたの中に。あなたは私にとっての答えであり、祝福であった…私が私自身であるための祝福」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to drip from her lashes.{/n} "And there's the answer... as I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in other people. In you. You are my answer and my blessing... The blessing to be myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}まつ毛から涙が零れ落ちる中、キベラがほほ笑む。{/n}「答えはそこにある…予想していたとおりに。迷宮がすべての謎の鍵を握っているわけではない。一部は他の人の中に見つけるべきものなの。あなたの中に。あなたは私にとっての答えであり、祝福であった…私が私自身であるための祝福」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈微笑起来，泪水打湿了她的睫毛。{/n}“而这就是答案……我早就心知肚明。迷宫不可能解答所有的谜团，有的钥匙必须从其他人身上找到。我的钥匙在你身上，你就是我的答案，我的祝福……允许我做我自己的祝福。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to drip from her lashes.{/n} "And there's the answer... as I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in other people. In you. You are my answer and my blessing... The blessing to be myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈微笑起来，泪水打湿了她的睫毛。{/n}“而这就是答案……我早就心知肚明。迷宫不可能解答所有的谜团，有的钥匙必须从其他人身上找到。我的钥匙在你身上，你就是我的答案，我的祝福……允许我做我自己的祝福。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah sourit, les larmes aux yeux.{/n} « Voilà donc la réponse... comme je m'y attendais. Le labyrinthe ne détient pas les clés de tous les mystères... certaines se trouvent en autrui. En vous. Vous êtes ma réponse, et ma bénédiction. Ma bénédiction d'être moi-même. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to drip from her lashes.{/n} "And there's the answer... as I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in other people. In you. You are my answer and my blessing... The blessing to be myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah sourit, les larmes aux yeux.{/n} « Voilà donc la réponse... comme je m'y attendais. Le labyrinthe ne détient pas les clés de tous les mystères... certaines se trouvent en autrui. En vous. Vous êtes ma réponse, et ma bénédiction. Ma bénédiction d'être moi-même. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın gülümsemesiyle birlikte gözyaşları kirpiklerinden damlamaya başlıyor.{/n} "İşte duyacağımdan emin olduğum... Cevap da buydu. Labirent, tüm gizemlerin cevabını barındırmıyor. Bazı gizemleri diğer insanlarda bulmak gerekiyor. Sende... Sen, benim hem cevabım hem de lütfumsun. Kendim olmamı sağlayan lütuf sensin."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles as tears begin to drip from her lashes.{/n} "And there's the answer... as I knew it would be. The labyrinth does not hold the keys to every mystery — some must be found in other people. In you. You are my answer and my blessing... The blessing to be myself."
